verses.verse: Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H539>believed<s%> our <S%H8052>report?<s%> and <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> is the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1540>revealed?<s%>

For he shall grow <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him as a tender <S%H3126>plant,<s%> and as a <S%H8328>root<s%> out of a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H4480>ground:<s%> <S%H776><s%> he hath <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8389>form<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1926>comeliness;<s%> and when we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him, there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4758>beauty<s%> that we should <S%H2530>desire<s%> him.

He is <S%H959>despised<s%> and <S%H2310>rejected<s%> of <S%H376>men;<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4341>sorrows,<s%> and <S%H3045>acquainted<s%> with <S%H2483>grief:<s%> and we <S%H4564>hid<s%> as it were our <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him; he was <S%H959>despised,<s%> and we <S%H2803>esteemed<s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>

Surely <S%H403><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H5375>borne<s%> our <S%H2483>griefs,<s%> and <S%H5445>carried<s%> our <S%H4341>sorrows:<s%> yet <S%H587>we<s%> did <S%H2803>esteem<s%> him <S%H5060>stricken,<s%> <S%H5221>smitten<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>

But <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H2490>wounded<s%> for our <S%H4480>transgressions,<s%> <S%H6588><s%> he was <S%H1792>bruised<s%> for our <S%H4480>iniquities:<s%> <S%H5771><s%> the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of our <S%H7965>peace<s%> was <S%H5921>upon<s%> him; and with his <S%H2250>stripes<s%> we are <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> we like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> have gone <S%H8582>astray;<s%> we have <S%H6437>turned<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his own <S%H1870>way;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6293>laid<s%> on <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of us <S%H3605>all.<s%>

He was <S%H5065>oppressed,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> yet he <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> he is <S%H2986>brought<s%> as a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> and as a <S%H7353>sheep<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> her <S%H1494>shearers<s%> is <S%H481>dumb,<s%> so he <S%H6605>openeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

He was <S%H3947>taken<s%> from <S%H4480>prison<s%> <S%H6115><s%> and from <S%H4480>judgment:<s%> <S%H4941><s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7878>declare<s%> his <S%H1755>generation?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he was cut <S%H1504>off<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H2416>living:<s%> for the <S%H4480>transgression<s%> <S%H6588><s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> was he <S%H5061>stricken.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>made<s%> his <S%H6913>grave<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6223>rich<s%> in his <S%H4194>death;<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>violence,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was any <S%H4820>deceit<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Yet it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1792>bruise<s%> him; he hath put him to <S%H2470>grief:<s%> <S%H518>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H7760>make<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> an offering for <S%H817>sin,<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> he shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

He shall <S%H7200>see<s%> of the <S%H4480>travail<s%> <S%H5999><s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and shall be <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> by his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall my <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6663>justify<s%> <S%H7227>many;<s%> for <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H5445>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H2505>divide<s%> him a portion with the <S%H7227>great,<s%> and he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6099>strong;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath poured <S%H6168>out<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto <S%H4194>death:<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H4487>numbered<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6586>transgressors;<s%> and he <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H2399>sin<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> and made <S%H6293>intercession<s%> for the <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>
